wordGroup: acquaint with 熟悉；使认识，使了解

sentences.en: You will first need to acquaint yourself with the filing system.
sentences.cn: 你首先需要熟悉文件归档方法。

sentences.en: Have steps been taken to acquaint breeders with their right to apply for licenses?
sentences.cn: 已经采取措施让饲养动物者了解他们申请执照的权利了吗？

sentences.en: Prior to the interview, acquaint yourself with the laws pertaining to job discrimination.
sentences.cn: 面试前，先熟悉与工作歧视有关的法律。
